title: Japanese Conversation Completion Quiz - Hard Mode
description: Complete the blanks in these Japanese conversation snippets. This quiz tests your ability to understand and use conversational Japanese effectively.
instructions: Type the appropriate word or phrase in Japanese using Romaji to complete the sentence.
The case (uppercase or lowercase) of your answer does not matter, as long as the spelling is correct.
After completing all questions, submit your answers for scoring.

items.question: Kare wa _______ ni tsuyoi desu. (He is strong in mathematics.)
Kanojo wa _______ ga jouzu desu. (She is good at singing.)
Kesa, _______ ga okuremashita. (This morning, the train was late.)
Ano mise wa _______ o hajimemashita. (That shop started selling new products.)
Kinou no party de _______ o takusan nomimashita. (I drank a lot of beer at yesterday's party.)
Watashi no inu wa _______ ga kirai desu. (My dog hates taking baths.)
Kotoshi no natsu wa _______ yotei ga arimasu ka? (Do you have any plans for this summer?)
Eiga no _______ ga kanashikatta. (The end of the movie was sad.)
Anata no ichiban _______ na tabemono wa nan desu ka? (What is your favorite food?)
Kare wa maiasa _______ o shimasu. (He jogs every morning.)
